name: Dump Or Hold
description:
Buy the dip? Pump and dump? Settle in for the long hold?

Have you got it all figured out, you day trader, you? Prove your nerves of steel in 'Dump Or Hold'!

How to Play: Hold for the long, or panic and dump your assets as the market develops. You are scored on how your choice performed in relation to the best possible choice. This is a quick minigame, so think fast, and don't worry if you mess up!

Let's separate the hardcore Wall Street cats from the newbie crypto-kittens!

Mini-game developed for the Jam For Change, hosted by DevSpace London in 10 hours. Featured in the compilation sold for the benefit of Woman's Aid UK.

Music by Amitrai (http://amitrai.itch.io, additional art by Yeony (@YeonjaeLee_Art).
